outputSpeech.text: Peach's down air has 2 parts.  hits 1 to 3 are active frames 12 to 13, 18 to 19 and  24 to 25.  hit 4 is active frames 30 to 31. Peach can act on frame 39. You can ask about another one of Peach's moves, or name another character and move.
